00155         enum DirtyBits
00156         {
00157             DIRTY_LAYOUT    = Object::DIRTY_CUSTOM << 0,
00158             DIRTY_SEGMENTS  = Object::DIRTY_CUSTOM << 1,
00159             DIRTY_LAYOUTS   = Object::DIRTY_CUSTOM << 2,
00160             DIRTY_FRUSTUM   = Object::DIRTY_CUSTOM << 3,
00161             DIRTY_CANVAS_BITS = DIRTY_LAYOUT | DIRTY_SEGMENTS | DIRTY_LAYOUTS |
00162                                 DIRTY_FRUSTUM | DIRTY_OBJECT_BITS
00163         };
00164 
00166         virtual uint64_t getRedistributableBits() const
